thread.title: Linksair loses Cardiff-Anglesey airline safety licence
thread.title_full: Linksair loses Cardiff-Anglesey airline safety licence - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Linksair loses Cardiff-Anglesey airline safety licence
text: The airline which operates the Cardiff-Anglesey air route has had its safety licence revoked. The Civil Aviation Authority (CAA) said the move had been taken to " protect the travelling public " . The CAA said: "The UK Civil Aviation Authority has suspended the safety certificate for UK airline Linksair. "Safety is always our first priority and we will always take action when necessary to protect the travelling public," it added. The Cardiff-Anglesey route is subsidised by the Welsh government, although Linksair also runs other routes around the UK. Share this story About sharing
